data.title: What are some common uses of Monte Carlo simulations? What are some other practical applications that make use of them?
data.meta_description: Answer: When a problem can be posed as a many-multi-dimentional non-linear objective functioned to be minimized, Monet Carlo techniques offer a way to break out of local minima and find better solutions elsewhere. It takes a lot of computer time. But we got a lot now. However, one can not be 100%...
